case.state: I wouldn't mind spendin' a little time to win a game of strip poker!
Never noticed there was poker here. Don't think I've ever made it past the bar.
By the looks of things, it's gonna take you a few more drinks than myself, but leave that all up to me!
I'm already chompin' at the bit. Let's get going!
Gimme a new glass and I'll be all set to go!
I'm bored already. Can we just skip this formal introduction stuff?
Careful who you're dealin' with. I'm arena champ multiple times runnin'!
Jin, you remind me of someone back home. Wonder what that horrible flirt's up to?
5 bucks says the glasses guy is the first to run when things get real...
I gotta strange feelin' that me an' the staff girl ain't gonna be seein' eye to eye this game...
Whatever you say, ...strange haired girl.
Now that looks like a girl whose willin' ta get absolutely smashed!
Would ya look at that, you got matching outfits!
Sure! Didn't know servers were playin' here, but the more the merrier, I s'pose!
We aren't going to have to deal with any hoity-toity nonsense, are we?
Maybe we could go for a quick dip before we start up here, eh?
Is anyone gonna shut those blinds?
Wouldn't mind goin' in for a quick dip after I'm done creamin' you all.
Oi! Fuck off! I'm not standin' in the middle of the street for your entertainment. I'm doin' it for mine!
I'm absolutely about to raid that bar, so don't no one try an' stop me.
Guess I only have to whoop two arses this game!
Just the three of us means less time to get to the good stuff!
I feel like there might be room at this table for one more person, but whatever...
Looks like it's just the four of us! Hope this means someone's a little more inclined to pick up our table's tab!
It's a ladies night out! Woo hoo!
Is it half off for ladies? 'Cause this place seems to be rakin' 'em in!
All men? Fine, fine, fine... But I ain't thrilled.
Hit me up with ~cards.text~ cards!
That'll be ~cards.text~ cards for me!
~cards.Text~ cards and another pint.
I dunno... ~cards.text~ cards?
~cards.Text~ cards. Give 'em 'ere.
No cards, but you could top me off.
I'll just use these ones, thanks.
Just the one, thanks.
I'm just one card away from beatin' you all!
Utter rubbish. All new ones.
Just swap 'em all out.
Alright! I'd like ta see some more of this!
I'll drink to that. 'Corse I woulda done that without a good hand.
There's nothin' to worry about this round!
You best believe that I'm thrilled to get this hand.
I guess I'm workin' my way down easy street with these cards.
Looks like I've got five tickets for a ship headin' towards victory!
What the hell do you think you're doin', tryin' ta beat me this round?
I don't see any chips around here, so I'll take my winnings for this round in cash.
Just another victory of many!
Feels good. It's almost therapeutic.
I'll just roll on to the next round, please and thank you.
Just what I was lookin' for!
I wonder who we'll see strip next?
I know you've been clamorin'. Not my fault I'm pretty dead good at this game.
Still not gonna lose!
And my streak continues!
Feel free to jump in anytime, ~player~.
So, how're we gonna deal with these?
Wouldn't you like to know about my hand? Well, my lips are sealed.
I wouldn't worry about ~player~. A bit of a blockhead, but it just takes 'em a while longer to swap cards is all.
Cards schmards. Just let me swing a sword around and enjoy the odd drink, that's all I need.
Oh man! Tonight, I think I'm gonna drink 'til my arms fall off!
Hmph. Could be better, I suppose...
Just wait for when I get real fired up!
I can't win the game with somethin' this bloody mediocre...
Ugh. Somebody up there hates me.
This hand's worse than some of the things I've trodden in.
I don't think the words "stinks" properly expresses what a disgraceful, disgusting, putrid mess of a hand this is.
What? I suppose the cards want a little peek at me too.
Is this what I get for not putting my boat ticket up on the wall at the tavern? Damn superstitions.
Well this is a mighty fine situation...
How much trouble can one bad hand cause?
I better not be playing with cheaters…
I did not order this hand on the rocks.
Guess I better fall back on the age-old tactic: bluff like crazy!
For the love of...
Am I wearing anything under these shorts? Guess you'll have to find out.
I guess I'll be next...
But I had such high hopes for seeing one of you strip...
Well, it was fun while it lasted...
There goes my beautiful, beautiful streak...
Guess it's time to put my money where my mouth is.
I think I might've actually overdone my boozin' this time. ...ergh... A tiny Chihiro in a small box. ...Alright.
I'm not usually like this with men, but most men I know wouldn't've come back. I think you already know all ya need about strength, Chihiro.
Though you have to admit... it is a little funny... Ha ha!
Looks like the real game's just startin'! Count me in, Mulan!

Saki, the numba of books I've read is single digits, I've been headbutter and headbuttee dozens of times, and my senses are duller than an antique knife from years a' drinkin', but even I saw that comin'!
Absolutely love the attitude, but I'm already way ahead of you. But if you're payin', I'll probably have a brandy after this one.
It'll take more than say... ~marker.drinks~ of these, before I'm stepping near that!
I checked out the bar an' most of 'em are just for show. Guess I'll be stickin' to my beer fa' this game.
I think I'll be takin' a big swig of this stuff every time someone shows somethin' especially pleasin' to the eye. Let's see how hammered I'll get before I'm belly up in this game!
Lushness? This is about my knockers, innit?
I think I'll start this game out with the simple, obvious choice.
That I am. Me an' my mates are all mercenaries.
It's Syrenne, and I've been waitin' right at the bar. Always will be.
Wha... nobody's asked me about the army in ages... thought I'd downed enough drinks to pass away those thoughts...
Hmph. Little personal there, but no. There ain't anybody like that for me.
It's about time one of you gawkers noticed. It ain't easy keepin' it like this, for starters.
Well, we did track down this vampire a few days ago that was abductin' people. Found out one of my mates screams like a schoolgirl. Pretty good time, all in all.
Well, it was mostly that contract mumbo-jumbo until we got a gig working as security in a castle, under a count.
The fuck...? ...Uh, well, no. An' I've seen enough guys tryna make me bed 'em by doin' that, you'd think I'd 'ave an idea.
Ugh. I hate those places. I dunno, guess ...the sewers beneath the prison was an absolute rank mess. Felt my nose was about to leg it.
Well, I don't think we have enough people for me to show off my latest trick! No spoilers, but it involves three knives, a fire mage, and another ten mugs of the good stuff!
A pair can't save ya forever, I s'pose.
This is what I get for playing it safe...
Maybe I shoulda gone for somethin' riskier than a pair?
Hmph. I guess I had to strip some time.
Off to an early lead I see! Sweet!
I figured I'd have to start stripping some time.
I think I'll start off nice and simple for my first time.
If my mates could see me now...
Sorry to keep you waiting.
Alright, I'm going. Keep your shirts on.
This thing's already gettin' all sweaty!
Might as well start with this! I don't wear it too often, anyways.
I'm glad someone is enjoyin' me tryin' ta be a little unconventional!
Honestly, I'm just gettin' a little hot. Plus, can't start off without showin' off a little, eh?
Shame then. People tell me I'm even better at ...conversation... when they're drunk.
That simple choice bein' my top, a' course.
Yeah? Bet they just lack my charmin' personality and roguish good looks.
Can't start out bein' a coward. Now, can ya?
I mean... well yes... I was in the army, but I haven't been part since... well since all the men turned tail and left the rest of us to... to...
HEY! Listen you orange gremlin, who the bloody hell is tellin' you about Lowe- ...About my personal life.
Sure. Meet other mercs all the time. They just don't got what my mates an' I got, is all.
Well, turns out that one of the Lords there was a closet perv and was peerin' in on the princess.
I wish I could spend that much, but that'd cut into my boozin' money an' I won't be havin' that. ...Hmmm. Yeah, I don't see the harm if you wanna come in for a touch.
Ugh... these fuckin' pricks. Like this one chap with the fuckin' balls to try to whip it out durin' a rescue! I woulda had him out cold if I was a tad more drunk at the time.
S'pose I'm constantly goin' from one grimy place to another, so I get the feelin'.
I mean, it's really all in the hips. Good enough rotation and you'll send even the toughest of lads cryin' back to their mums!
I'm always a little drunk. Can't be helped.
Easy-peasy-lemon-squeezy.
Don't worry. I'm used to most of the boys not havin' much to say when I'm close.
Tough luck, ~player~. You'll get 'em next time. Actually... probably not...
I've been meanin' ta bring this up, but are you really named "Mister"? Like, nothin' else? No last name?
Line 'em up and knock 'em down.
Like I'm gonna strip naked in a place like this.
Alright, alright. Show us what you got, ~name~.
C'mon! Waitin's for chumps!
Don't low ball me here, alright?
I'll believe you'll strip somethin' good when I see it.
What's with the blindfold? You blow your eyes out or somethin'?
Actually, you remind me 'a one of my mates...
Alright, "Manly-man". Let's see how you absolutely dazzle us to start out.
Talk is cheap, four-eyes! Get to the good stuff!
What'll happen next? His pants? His glasses? Will Kamina ever learn to shut up?
What'll it be? Glasses? Cape?
I've known a lot of men over the years. Let's see if you can make lighting strike twice.
Hey. D'you want a pint of... oh... Carry on with whatever thing you're doin' right now!
What'll it be, blondie? I don't wanna feel jipped at your first go around.
(We're this far in and no bad pick-up lines or nothin'! Ryuji's a lot better than most guys...)
Say, um... how's that leg of yours holdin' up, Ryuji?
Oh no! Not in front of all the pretty girls! ~name~'s heart can't take it!
Try and say a pickup line and whatever you strip is gettin' stuffed down ya throat.
Of course ~name~ is stripping, he can barely keep it in his pants any ways!
Got your wish, I suppose. Only guy here.
It’s all fun and games ‘til someone has to strip.
Nice, nice. I'm likin' the direction we're headin' in.
Why don't ya have a drink? It'll loosen you up a bit.
Don't worry. Doubt anyone expected the world of ya.
That was easy enough. No sweat.
Hmmm. You think I can finish this one before you're done stripping?
Sucks to bet it all on a losing hand.
Wanna see if I can grab some other people? I'm sure they'd love to sit and 'ave a chat while we play.
Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip! Strip!
Takin' 'em down one by one!
I'll be takin' you out right quick.
Better not hold back. I won't be.
It's good to move up in the world!
Knew we'd find some chinks in yer armor at some point! (Though this might be a little more literal than I thought)
Looks like that armor didn't stop this blow!
Alright, blondie. Show us how it's done!
Blondie's turn? My, how the time flies.
You know the drill by now, don't you, blondie?
I'm gonna need you to keep spirits high as we go into this round, ~name~!
Woo! Give out that positive energy, ~name~!
Fuck yeah! Give it your all, ~name~!
Oh, I like her. Real good energy from this one.
You seem like a girl to have a natter with after this is done! I'll try an' remember ya!
Ah! Sounds like we're from around the same parts!
That's a bloody nice accent you got there, ~name~!
Let's get a move on, you toff.
Oh joy, Little Miss Fancybritches here is gonna grace us with the opportunity to watch her strip.
Don't mean to slag off the posh bird with my scrotty appearance and poxy slang, but could you get a wriggle on before I chunder from havin' to look at this chinless wonder for too long?
Doesn't matter what you came in here wearin', 'cause most of us will be finishin' this game wearin' the same damn thing. Start strippin'.
I assume you don't want a sip before you get into it, do ya?
I suppose you'll be usin' up your piddlin' items before we get to anything real spicy.
I 'ope you know what you're gettin' into.
We really gotta make this muffin of a girl strip down?
Wonder what it'd be like to wear somethin' like that? What with my ass hangin' out an' all...
Is that a school uniform? Are you even old enough to drink?
Uniform, huh? Ah, what's the harm in a drink now and then?
Alright, short stack. Show 'em what for!
You should know what to do, shorty.
C'mon, small fry, no slipping through the cracks this time.
Buck up, girlie. Yer gonna 'ave ta survive a few of these rounds.
If yer feelin' shy, that's nothin' that ol' liquid courage can't fix!
Maybe you can't face your fears now, but you can certain face them drunk!
I 'ear what you're sayin' but go get 'em anyways!
Is it everythin' you signed up for and more?
Watch it! What's with the banging and what not?
She's goin' for it again! Brace yourselves!
I think this'll be a pretty good time to practice dodgin'!
Is this really how we're gonna have to go through it every time?
Gotta say, you didn't really strike me as the sword-type. I was kinda surprised you were armed.
You look like you're the type of bird who likes a challenge!
Is it strippin'? I really hope your plannin' on strippin'.
Alright! I gotta learn me that glowy power-up whatever!
Another string of bad luck? Oh... sorry you ain't got it in your heart anymore...
Don't worry about nothin'. You'll get strong soon enough. I feel it.
If you want physical strength, then that's a different story.
Ah... you were talkin' about the emotional shit an' all that... Slightly different...
Hey um... Chihiro. You ain't lookin' hot. What's got you all in a mess?
Chihiro! Welcome back, mate!
I've been noticin' that you seem to 'ave a thing fer gettin' in shape. You've got experience with exercise, innit?
Y'know, I think I prefer the messy hair look on you.
Y'know, I'm actually real good mates with a princess back home. She kinda strikes somma the same notes as you, actually.
So, you don't drink or nothin'. What do you do when you get free time?
Just how fast are we talkin' when we go on that "joyride" in ya car?
You sayin' somethin', Ini? Ya gotta strip, if ya forgot again!
Well, well. Still think you ain't gonna lose?
That thing you were holding? They throw you into the slammer, Jolyne?
Y'know, you're pretty ripped there Jolyne. Midriff's doin' ya wonders.
Hmph. Guess it's off with the pants. Wouldn't want to spoil things too early, eh?
This is sort of weird, but I heard people talking about how I was some sort of game... person.
"Love fairy"? What kinda lewd scenarios are you thinking about? Hand holding?
Oh, that reminds me, after this you and me gotta go to O'Halligan's tonight!
That's... that's a fuckin' sheep...
Looks like you're outta clothes... Does she gotta masturbate now?
Witch, hm? I've got a few friends who can do all that magic-type stuff!
Camera? Hell's that?
Strip whatever you want. Unlike some men I've met, I trust that you won't back out when ya finally get to the nitty-gritty.
Sure you don't wanna pick that camera-dealie? Give yerself another chance to turn this all around?
I 'eard you were from a society of all women. That true?
You don't seem much like the other military types out there. Doesn't seem like there's any stick up your arse.
You're one of those book-y types, yeah?
Say, ...Ping, what's with the get up?
Can't fool me! I'm not that drunk. ...Yet.
Y'know, I was raised by a group of women warriors.
That's a pretty badass sword you've got there, Mulan.
Say, Nami? 'Bout how much is that reward on yer head for, exactly?
You're some kinda fortune-girl aren't ya? Used to be one of those outside the bar on Lazulis.
I see you brought yourself that harp dealie. Takin' requests?
Oi! What's happenin'? Nayru! Nayru!
Came to this thing quite dolled up didn't ya?
Still keepin' that smugness, I see. I'm sure all your friend just love that about you.
Ugh... I can't stand these prissy types. Always too good for scum like me.
You better not start talkin' about the "intricately layered artisan flavorings" in your drink, there.
So, heard you were a mercenary.
Rough. Now I'm down for strippin' an' all, but how 'bout a little competition to help spice this up a little?
You definitely look like a woman who can hold her own, Rinkah.
Say, what's your weapon of choice, Rinkah?
You've been mentionin' it for a while now, but since I have no bloody idea what yer talkin' about, here goes: The hell's a biker squad?
Ya done an' did it now! I'll be seein' your tits soon enough!
This isn't really my first tangle with the undead, an' you seem pretty alright, so I didn't really feel any need to antagonize ya or nothin'.
Isn't this place crackin'? They've got strip poker and a fully stocked bar!
Say... why are you even wearin' armor in the first place?
So this is what assassins are like from around here?
I see you can do that card-floatin' trick, Sheena. You magic?
Hero, huh? Explains the get up.
Ya wouldn't make a fuss about sparin' a fry or three, would ya?
Kinda had to expect that. You are winnin' after all.
'Bout time you had a loss!
You can't keep first place forever!
Not exactly the best at this game are ya?
You sure ya don't need to run through the rules?
A tie! That's bloody crazy!
Don't be such a chicken!
You're so thick sometimes, ~name~. What do you think we're here for?
I'm already bored to tears...
Ah, yes. This. This is totally what I came here to see.
Sets accessory marker
It's been what? At least ~marker.accessory~ times it's only been lame shite?
Afraid of doin' what's asked? Typical man...
You can't just faff about! We've already seen too mucha this, you knob!
Does it conceal some "great hidden power"?
Oh yes, kicking off your sandals... very impressive...
All offense, but you don't seem to be the type to pick up on things quick. You even know how to use that sword you brandish like a new piercing?
Seemed like you got it pretty out of it beforehand.
If I lose this game 'cos I passed out fram hunder while waiting for you to strip, then you can't blame me.
It's a smart move, but that doesn't mean I have to like it.
Don't worry too much. Women change their minds from one second to the next.
You really want your ass kicked, don't ya?
Ugh... this is almost as tedious as that damn staircase.
At least Mahiru has the right idea!
I agree, Mahiru. Nothin' but disappointment.
Take your ~clothing~ and stick it up your arse! Then you can have another small item to remove!
Couldn't have put it better myself, Mahiru. Geez...
Just be glad that you need to be kept concious for your soon comin' rub off.
You need me to grab some steel toed boots, so I can finally crush the coward outta ya?
Hmph. (When this is over, I'm goin' staight for his gnads, boots or not.)
No offense, blind boy, but if he can see his cards, who knows what else he can see with that thing?
Hmph. Alright, but I'll still be keeping my eyes on you...
Yes, more kicks. I'm about to faint from excitement...
I'm quaking in my boots...
Even if ya lost your belt just now, good to see it's faring better!
Scared? C'mon, you're already mostly there...
Ugh. You've stripped this far, but can't finish the job. That it?
Now we're gettin' cold feet?
We aren't getting cheeky all of a sudden, are we?
Nothing wrong with some hors d’oeuvres while you're waitin' on the main course.
Whatcha takin' off there? ~clothing~?
And we're waiting... And we're waiting... And we're waiting...
Yeah, that's an alright choice I s'pose. Not great...
Well, you won't win any medals for originality...
Just get to the point already!
Ugh... It's more bloody annoying than it is satisfying.
Nobody tell you? Hope you stick around, in any case.
Yeah! What the redhead said!
Man up! Tell 'em, Mahiru!
C'mon, lads! You don't see Mahiru takin' off small stuff anymore!
Is this the one time a man isn't going to rush in, cock first?
That's actually pretty smart, blondie. I'm impressed.
Do... do I know any other blondes?
Now, blondie, I think we both know that your ~clothing~ just ain't cuttin' it.
Aren't you a little overdressed, bein' here?
Do you always dress so formally when you go out for strip poker?
Buck up. It's only something small.
I'm sure we'll get to some bigger stuff later. Just get rid of your ~clothing~ for now.
If ya ever need that little oomph to getcha to remove bigger stuff, boy do I have the stuff for you!
Keep on it, ~name~. You're doin' great.
Now's not the time for any slow-pokes or inhibitions.
So, there's this brandy they keep on the top shelf and I was just thinking...
I don't think I actually know anyone who's as tall as ~name~.
Why can't I be tall like ~name~? Think of how many more drinks I could down!
Sets accessory marker
I'm already proper fed up with this.
Ugh. More of this shit.
Can't ya just diddle yourself with what ya got still on ya instead?
The hell? Ya legs! What was in that drink?
I'm great with secrets. 'Cept when I'm drunk. Which, granted, is most of the time.
That's it! You'll get 'em next time!
I've been playin' cards for years and I'm not that bad of a fighter neither.
See. Just a little ribbon. Easy-peasy stuff.
Let's see... that takes some vigorous stretching, weeks of training, extra calories that you can burn...
First step to that is lettin' go of your inhibitions. An' if ya can't do it naturally, I know a little liquid courage couldn't hurt...
Y'see, I've been goin' out an' gettin' plastered a lot lately an' I think I might be comin' up with a bit a' a gut 'cause of it. You good for anythin' 'bout how ta get it down?
Maybe it's just that slight bit of rebellion that I think ya got in ya. Makes it kinda... stand out.
You, eh... you good over there, Ini?
Since yer already pretty out of it, fancy goin' on a bit of a bender? I'll buy!
My mates and I were arrested once, actually. We didn't do anything to deserve it, though.
They were talking about something called "blideo bames". Never heard of it, personally.
Pft. I'd rather just arm wrestle!
You're a princess, too? I'm shocked. Absolutely gobsmacked.
We all have that type of friend.
Pictures? From such a small box?
Not that I don't appreciate lads, they just have ta live up to the whole "man-up" creed they're always blatherin' on about...
Wouldn't that be a nice change of pace!
Is that a beret? You aren't one of those artsy stuck up pricks are you?
So, whaddya say to a drinkin' bender once we're all finished here?
I'm not really much for that type 'a stuff. More of a "learn by doing" type.
Just seems a little... behind the times, y'know?
Nothin' better than finding more people out there willin' to fight the good fight!
Interestin'. I've heard of controllin' the elements, but never the weather itself.
Damn! That's a bloody nice lookin' tattoo! Almost as impressive as my own!
Feh... You dropped somethin', but it wasn't your pants nor ya standards. I ain't all that interested.
How about me? I can see it now... riches... arena champion... a bar to call my own...
Was hopin' on hearing something exciting. When you get your hands free, that is.
An' ya even brought someone to help you strip, too. Seems excessive.
Just don't meet too many people in my own line of work these days, is all.
I don't know about Ronapour, but back in Lazulis we can hold our liquor. How's about we see if you can take me? Shot for shot.
I grew up in a family of warrior women, actually.
I'm partial to swords, myself. Usually like to keep two lasses with me on contracts and such.
Though we'll see how fully stocked it is after we're done with it.
Gotta say, I expected less... flashy colors.
Never really could understand any of that magic bollocks... I have tried though...
What kinda money do you make on that type of life? You've gotta be loaded, right?
Is that it? Ugh. Waste of a round.
Apologizing ain't gonna change owt, but it's a start.
I didn’t know I was playing with a bunch of prudes.
Time just flies here. Next round!
We've got a good momentum right now! Can't stop yet!
Bold move. Most people wouldn't do that when ya opponent isn't afraid to belt you one.
Don't suppose you'll just up an' decide to forfeit early, would ya?
I'd try an' knock some common decency into ya, but... I've already been kicked outta too many places.
It's fine. I'm fine.
Is the kitty done playing around and ready to join the real game?
I think I can take whatever you can dish out, I'm one of the top champions at the arena back home.
Just consider this yer trainin'! We'll get you stronger in no time at all!
More for me, then. ...Ah, I'm just funnin' ya.
...Maybe we could get you some trousers while we're at it...
But, comin' from a place where "prim an' proper" meant the same thing as "absolute wanker", maybe I ain't the best judge a' things.
I thought I'd seen all the types of people, but I ain't never been near someone like you, Ini.
Suit yerself. Offer still stands if you wanna get absolutely legless later. I'm talkin' completely mortal. Utterly pissed.
It was fine though. Found a tunnel. Fought a giant monster. Passed out on the stairs to the surface. Y'know, normal stuff.
I didn't know what to say when they asked me what my favorite was, so I just did a series of skillful backflips.
Wait a minute...
I'm scared. I'm sweatin' like a slag in church. Makes me wanna strip down some more to cool off.
Am I that one friend? Or does everyone else just not just into battle fast enough?
Long as it's one less layer for you, doesn't matter bugger-all what it does!
I think we're gonna get along just fine, you and I.
Come from a group of mostly all women warriors, myself. Wouldn't mind goin' back to that from time to time.
I s'pose that's my mistake, then. I didn't realize I was talkin' to a real fighter.
I'll even sweeten the deal by 'avin' one a' my mates generously pick up our tab whenever I get around to tellin' 'im!
(What... why am I getting this weird feeling about this chick?)
Oh! That was damn fast!
Whatever floats your ship, I s'pose, but I'll be beatin' ya guy or gal!
Care for a quick spar once we're all outta here? I could use the practice!
Not really one for them kinda magic what's-its anyways. Much more of a rough n' tumble, work it out with my fists sorta bird, y'know?
What's that ink a' yours all about, anyways?
Ah. Poker would be borin' without a few twists mixed in! Plus, I'm skint after payin' out my bar tab!
I don't know what kinda weird magic that was, but as long as I get to see you lose, I'll be fine with it.
It's just some light work back in Lazulis, so I don't plan on steppin' on people's toes or no shit.
Damn. Wish they sold shit like those guns where I'm from. We ain't got nothin' even close.
Nice to see other women who can kick some ass!
It's nice that we can take a load off for a bit and don't need to carry our weapons.
Moonblast, eh? I'll try that one after I'm done with one or two of these.
Then again, if I was on the lookout for an assassin, I'd never suspect the bird decked out in pastels!
First time tryin' to make a fireball, I could only hold get it goin' for a second before it exploded. ...Took my clothes with it...
